---
name: planning-related-docs
interactive: true
description: Collects related documentation links for a new feature or backlog item. Use this skill to prompt for and validate related docs as part of planning workflows. Supports interactive mode for user input.
---

argument-hint:
/related-docs: |
Parameters: none
Action: Prompt the user to list any related documentation links (optional), validate input, and return the value.
Example: /related-docs
